Card 8: External Influence
Eight of Wands in shadow (reversed)

Eight of Wands in shadow (reversed)
 
External Influence - This card portrays the external world and 
its impact on the situation. It might symbolize the societal and 
emotional milieu, along with others' perceptions.
 
# Eight of Wands in shadow: Your house or environment is about 
resisting insisting things must always stay the same 
 
*****************************************************************
